content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadafdev01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE access_z309_tpropmeter (
	[N_PROP] varchar(100),
	[N_PROP_METE] varchar(100),
	[N_METE_READ_ROUT] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_TYPE] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_READ_FREQ] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_GRID_LOCA] varchar(100),
	[C_READ_INST_NUM1] varchar(100),
	[C_READ_INST_NUM2] varchar(100),
	[F_METE_ADDI_DESC] varchar(100),
	[F_METE_ROUT_PREP] varchar(100),
	[F_METE_WARN_NOTE] varchar(100),
	[D_METE_FIT] varchar(100),
	[N_METE_READ_SEQU] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_POSI_STAT] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_CHAN_REAS] varchar(100),
	[N_METE_CHAN_ADVI] varchar(100),
	[D_METE_REMO] varchar(100),
	[F_METE_CONN] varchar(100),
	[N_METE_MAKE] varchar(100),
	[D_PROP_METE_UPDA] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_CLAS] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_CATE] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_GROU] varchar(100),
	[C_METE_READ_LOCA] varchar(100),
	[T_METE_SERV] varchar(100),
	[_DLRawZoneTimeStamp] datetime2(7),
	[year] varchar(4),
	[month] varchar(2),
	[day] varchar(2)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'access/z309_tpropmeter/delta/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadafdev01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM access_z309_tpropmeter
GO
